ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
Tarot's search to find her sister and the book of forbidden magick, leads her to a group of ring stones and a creature named Pan who has trapped several maidens in an endless dance with his music. With his sights now set upon Tarot, he seeks to bewitch her and make her one of his helpless servants!
